Package index

All functions

Math(<units>)
Mathematical operations for units objects
Ops(<units>)
S3 Ops Group Generic Functions for units objects
as_difftime()
convert units object into difftime object
boxplot(<units>)
boxplot for unit objects
cbind(<units>) rbind(<units>)
Combine R Objects by Rows or Columns
convert_to_base()
Convert units to their base units
deparse_unit()
deparse unit to string in product power form (e.g. km m-2 s-1)
drop_units()
Drop Units
hist(<units>)
histogram for unit objects
install_unit() remove_unit()
Define or remove units
keep_units()
Apply a function keeping units
load_units_xml()
Load a unit system
matrixOps(<units>)
S3 matrixOps Group Generic Functions for units objects
mixed_units() `units<-`(<mixed_units>)
Create or convert to a mixed units list-column
make_unit_label() plot(<units>)
Plot units objects
scale_x_units() scale_y_units() scale_colour_units() scale_color_units() scale_fill_units() scale_alpha_units() scale_size_units() scale_size_area_units() scale_radius_units() scale_linewidth_units()
Continuous scales for units data
seq(<units>)
seq method for units objects
ud_are_convertible() ud_convert()
udunits2 utilities
unitless
The "unit" type for vectors that are actually dimension-less.
units-defunct
Defunct functions in units

units_options()
set one or more units global options
